GSD.impact: Discord token and leveldb file stealers
GSD.description: In the PyPi Easyfuncsys package there is malicious code that appears to be stealing Discord tokens allowing it to access Discord as that user, additionally it appears to be stealing leveldb files.

OSV.summary: malicious code in PyPi Humanqueen version all
OSV.details: In the PyPi Easyfuncsys package there is malicious code that appears to be stealing Discord tokens allowing it to access Discord as that user, additionally it appears to be stealing leveldb files.
